text: Four ships of the United States Navy have borne the name USS Ingraham, named in honor of Captain Duncan Ingraham *, was a Wickes-class destroyer, launched in 1918 and struck in 1936 *, was a Gleaves-class destroyer, launched in 1941 but sank after a collision in 1942 *, was an Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer, launched in 1944 and transferred to Greece in 1971 *, is an Oliver Hazard Perry-class frigate, launched in 1988 and decommissioned in 2014 Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Ingraham
